rulesStrings.li: setup->At the center of Mundas is Nirn our home. And for that we have to thank its creators. Lorkhan and the 8 Divines, [deity0_name], [deity1_name], [deity2_name],[deity3_name], [deity4_name], [deity5_name], [deity6_name] and [deity7_name].
story(uses=1,priority=10)->The Divines are the creators of life, love, time, and protectors of spirits, death, and the afterlife.
story(uses=1,priority=5)->[deity0_name], chief diety of the almighty, god of time have come to worship you and your pantheon.
story(uses=1,priority=1)->For this pantheon we follow, their will is our own, our lives devoted and our souls forever theirs.
